#summary BloomImage works with BloomDevice to fit images to a mobile device.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

BloomImage implements template tags that work with BloomDevice to generate images that fit mobile devices.

For example:

{{{
{% load deviceimage %}
{% deviceimage "image.jpg" 75x75 as image %}
<img src="{{ image }}" width="{{ image.width }}" height="{{ image.height }}" />
}}}

= Installation Overview =

  # Install BloomDevice
  # Install the [http://effbot.org/zone/pil-index.htm Python Imaging Library] (PIL)
  # Install `[http://code.google.com/p/sorl-thumbnail/ sorl-thumbnail]`
  # Add `bloom.image` to `INSTALLED_APPS`
  # Use the `device_image` Template Tag Library

= Installation Guide =

=== 1. Install BloomDevice ===

To install Bloom Device follow the steps in the installation guide:

[http://code.google.com/p/django-bloom/wiki/BloomDevice http://code.google.com/p/django-bloom/wiki/BloomDevice]

=== 2. Install the [http://effbot.org/zone/pil-index.htm Python Imaging Library] (PIL) ===

BloomImage requires the image manipulation functions provided by the PIL. Installing the PIL is currently out of scope for this guide. Here are good links to get you started:

  * [http://effbot.org/zone/pil-index.htm Python Imaging Library]
  * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/images/installingPIL.html Google Guide to Installing PIL]

=== 3. Install `[http://code.google.com/p/sorl-thumbnail/ sorl-thumbnail]` ===

`sorl-thumbnail` is a pluggable Django application used for creating thumbnail images. It works just as well generating images for mobile devices. You can check it out from Google Code.

{{{
svn checkout http://sorl-thumbnail.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ sorl-thumbnail
}}}

At the time of writing `sorl-thumbnail` has not been packaged so you will need to place it in on your Python Path yourself.

=== 4. Add `bloom.image` to `INSTALLED_APPS` ===

{{{
INSTALLED_APPS = (
    ...
    'bloom.device',
    'bloom.image',
    ...
)
}}}

=== 5. Use the `device_image` Template Tag Library ===

BloomDevice currently generates images that fit the full width of a mobile device.

{{{
{% load device_image %}
{% deviceimage "image.jpg" 75x75 as image %}
<img src="{{ image }}" width="{{ image.width }}" height="{{ image.height }}" />
}}}
